type ListCommandEventHandler = delegate of obj * ListCommandEventArgs -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您创建委托控件，需要标识将处理的事件的方法。When you create a delegate for a control, you identify the method that will handle the event. 生成项事件时通知该处理程序。The notifies the handler when an item event is generated. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 默认呈现此控件提供一个 UI，使用户可以单击各列表项。For default rendering, the control provides a UI that allows the user to click individual list items. 在回发时，该控件调用事件处理程序，指向源项的参数。On postback, the control calls the event handler, with an argument pointing to the source item. 属性的值为 `null`。The value of the property is `null`. 当使用模板进行渲染，ASP.NET 的浮升事件机制调用方法。When rendering with a template, the event bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET calls the method. 事件处理程序传递参数，指向到源项和生成事件的控件属性。The event handler is passed a parameter, pointing to the source item, and to the property of the control that generated the event. 这可以呈现具有多个关联交互的单个列表项。This allows you to render a single list item with multiple associated interactions. 若要呈现为超链接的项，可以设置属性设置为`true`。To render an item as a hyperlink, you can set the property to `true`. 值属性用于显示和内容的属性用作时选择的目标链接地址。The value of the property is used for display, and the contents of the property are used as the target link address when selected. > [!NOTE] > 这些链接将不会生成命令事件。Command events will not be generated for these links.
